description.value:
The Athletic Student can be quite the popular character, typically because they help their school's sport teams excel and win championships! Able-bodied, muscular, and with an attractive physique, they carry an aura of confidence and prowess with them wherever they go.

Restriction: Must start the game with at least 12 Strength

Student Abilities:

  • Characteristic Points: +2 to Strength, +1 to Any Other

  • Starting Skills: Athletics, Influence, Coordination

  • Athletic Endurance: @UUID[Compendium.mka.studenttypes.gTFJscI9OmacPPVX]{Athletic Endurance} You may use Inspiration and, as a Free Action, your next Strength or Constitution Skill Check result becomes 20+Mod. You may only use this ability during a Non-Combat Encounter and it can used after dice are rolled.
